MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Budworth Road, Tabley Hill Lane, Chester Road and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:30PM due to repairs required to faulty equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:41PM on 20th October 2020.
